Title: Relates to the identification of sectors of the local and regional economy with anticipated growth and/or potential for future growth; establishes the NYS underrepresented women's incentive award
Summary: Relates to the identification of sectors of the local and regional economy with anticipated growth and/or potential for future growth and the assessment of underrepresentation of women in such sectors; establishes the New York State underrepresented women's incentive award.
LawCode: Add ยง10-d, Lab L; add ยง669-i, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the identification of sectors of the local and regional economy with anticipated growth and/or potential for future growth and the assessment of underrepresentation of women in such sectors; and to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the New York state underrepresented women's incentive award
